channel.title: Cdn on Edd Mann
channel.description: Recent content in Cdn on Edd Mann

item.title: Providing Local JS and CSS Resources for CDN Fallbacks
item.description: In a recent podcast the topic of using Content Delivery Networks (CDN) to host commonly used resources such as jQuery and Twitter Bootstrap came up. The merits of having access to large-scale delivery infrastructure provided by Google etc. are significant. There is also the possibility that the client will already have these assets cached.
